QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

IconBaseURL.title: Icon Base URL
IconBaseURL.description: URL where all the icons are located

PopUpBaseURL.title: Popup Base URL
PopUpBaseURL.description: Combine this URL with the PUC to get popup info

crs1_CaseInformation.description: The basic information section contains information that identifies the action and some key descriptive variables, such as case status and case type.

CaseNumber.title: Case Number
CaseNumber.description: A unique number identifying the enforcement action. For EPA civil cases, these numbers begin with either the two digit EPA Region Code, "HQ" (headquarters initiated cases), and "EF" or "WF" (Eastern or Western Field Office CAA Mobile Source Program cases); followed by the fiscal year in which the action was initiated. After the fiscal year there is a sequence number. State NPDES civil cases start with the two character post abbreviation, followed by a sequence number.

CaseName.title: Case Name
CaseName.description:
A unique number identifying the enforcement action. For EPA civil cases, these numbers begin with either the two digit EPA Region Code, "HQ" (headquarters initiated cases), and "EF" or "WF" (Eastern or Western Field Office CAA Mobile Source Program cases); followed by the fiscal year in which the action was initiated. After the fiscal year there is a sequence number. State NPDES civil cases start with the two character post abbreviation, followed by a sequence number.
For criminal cases, the ID was generated in ECHO based on the following format: CR [prosecution_summary_id]. The source of the Prosecution Summary ID is the Summary of Criminal Prosecutions database.

CaseType.title: Case Type
CaseType.description: The unique code that identifies a type of compliance event or enforcement action.

CaseStatus.title: Case Status
CaseStatus.description: The status of the compliance event or enforcement action.

CaseStatusDate.title: Case Status Date
CaseStatusDate.description: The date of the most recent milestone activity.

RegionalDocketNumber.title: Regional Docket Number
RegionalDocketNumber.description: The number the Clerk of the Court assigns to a case that is filed or to a consent decree when it is lodged.  For administrative cases, it is the number assigned to the case by the Regional Hearing Clerk.

DOJDocketNumber.title: DOJ Docket Number
DOJDocketNumber.description: The docket number assigned by the Department of Justice to EPA's Enforcement Action.

Lead.title: Lead Agency
Lead.description: The lead agency (e.g., EPA, State) conducting the inspection

ReliefSought.title: Relief Sought
ReliefSought.description: The description for the type of relief requested in the complaint.

EnforcementOutcome.title: Enforcement Outcome
EnforcementOutcome.description: A description of the mechanism by which the Enforcement Action is resolved.

HeadquartersDivision.title: Headquarters Division
HeadquartersDivision.description: The EPA Headquarters division that is tracking the case.

Branch.title: Branch
Branch.description: The Branch or Unit of the Office of Regional Counsel assigned for the case.

ResultVolDisclosure.title: Result of Voluntary Disclosure Flag
ResultVolDisclosure.description: A flag that indicates the Enforcement Action was the result of a self disclosure.

MultiMediaCase.title: Multimedia Action Flag
MultiMediaCase.description: The flag indicating whether the activity was a multimedia action.

EnforcementType.title: Enforcement Type
EnforcementType.description: A text description of the Enforcement Action type.

TotalFederalPenalty.title: Total Federal Penalty
TotalFederalPenalty.description: For civil judicial enforcement actions, this amount is the federal penalty assessed against the defendant(s)  as specified in the final entered Consent Decree or Court Order. For administrative enforcement actions, it is the penalty assessed in the Consent/Final Order. It does not include the amount of the penalty mitigated due to a SEP or the amount shared with the state or local entities. Interest payments associated with a penalty paid over time are not included in this amount.

TotalStatePenalty.title: Total State Penalty
TotalStatePenalty.description: The total dollar penalty amount from all settlements to be paid to a state or local enforcement authority that is party to a concluded enforcement action.

TotalSEPCost.title: Total Supplemental Environmental Projects Cost
TotalSEPCost.description: The total value of all SEPs for all settlements at the enforcement case.

TotalComplianceActionCost.title: Total Compliance Action Cost
TotalComplianceActionCost.description: The estimated dollar value of injunctive relief and other physical/nonphysical costs of returning to compliance, from all settlements at a case. Injunctive relief represents the actions a defendant is ordered to undertake to achieve and maintain compliance, such as installing a new pollution control device to reduce air pollution, or preventing emissions of a pollutant in the first place.

TotalCostRecovery.title: Total Cost Recovery
TotalCostRecovery.description: The amount of the cost recovery ordered or agreed to be repaid by the responsible parties, cost recovery whole dollar amount awarded by the Court and due the the Superfund. For administrative cases, it is the cost recovery whole dollar amount of the Final Order.

CaseSummary.title: Case Summary
CaseSummary.description: The summary of the violation environmental problem and a description of the cause of action (basis of legal action).  The summary could be extracted from the referral transmission memo or letter or it could be required as the first section of a revised standardized referral document.

crs1_CaseMilestones.description: The major milestone events tracked for the enforcement action.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: Identifies a major judicial or administrative enforcement action milestone.

ActualDate.description: The actual date on which the event was completed/achieved.

crs1_Citations.description: The corresponding regulation in the Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) or U.S. Code (U.S.C.) associated with the enforcement action.

Title.title: Title
Title.description: The title held by a person in an organization.

Programs.title: Programs
Programs.description: A description of the EPA program(s) under which an enforcement action has been taken, and which correspond to the cited statutes and sections.

crs1_ComplianceSchedules.description: This section provides compliance schedule milestone activity information for a subset of EPA judicial consent decrees with compliance schedules.

FacilityFRSID.title: Facility FRS ID
FacilityFRSID.description: The number assigned by the Facility Linkage Application that is used to associate facility records from multiple environmental database systems that are known or believed to represent the same facility.

ScheduleNumber.title: Schedule Number
ScheduleNumber.description: A two-digit number which in combination with the Schedule Type and NPDES ID uniquely identifies a Compliance Schedule.

ScheduleCommentText.title: Schedule Comment Text
ScheduleCommentText.description: The free-text field used to store descriptive Compliance Schedule information.

ScheduleEventDescription.title: Schedule Event Description
ScheduleEventDescription.description: The description of the particular event with which the permittee is scheduled to comply.

ScheduleDate.title: Schedule Date
ScheduleDate.description: The date the event is scheduled to be completed (i.e. the due date).

ActualDate.description: The actual date on which the Compliance Schedule event was completed/achieved.

EventAmount.ComplianceSchedules.description: The dollar amount of a scheduled payment initiated through a penalty action or a cost recovery pursuant to a Final Order.

crs1_ComplyingActions.description: For civil enforcement actions, the value of the costs incurred by the defendant/respondent to attain compliance with the law and restore the environment. This value does not include penalties, cost recovery, or costs associated with SEPs.

ComplyingActionId.title: Complying Action ID
ComplyingActionId.description: The unique identifier for an enforceable requirement obliging the defendant/respondent to take or refrain from certain specified actions.

ComplyingActionType.title: Complying Action Type
ComplyingActionType.description: A code that uniquely identifies the requirements obliging the defendant/respondent to take or refrain from certain actions.

ComplyingActionDescription.title: Complying Action Description
ComplyingActionDescription.example: Migrated Industrial/Municipal Process Change (Includes Flow Reduction)
ComplyingActionDescription.description: A text description of the type of the requirements obliging the defendant/respondent to take or refrain from certain actions.

ComplyingActionCategory.title: Complying Action Category
ComplyingActionCategory.description: The category (i.e., Direct Environmental Reduction, Preventative, or Facility Management or Information Practice) to which a Complying Action belongs.

crs1_Defendants.description: This section lists each defendant's name and whether the defendant was named in the complaint and/or in the settlement.

DefendantName.title: Defendant Name
DefendantName.description: The name of the defendant, or respondent associated with the Enforcement Action.

NamedInComplaint.title: Named In Complaint Flag
NamedInComplaint.description: A flag that indicates whether the Defendant or Respondent was named in the filed complaint.

NamedInSettlement.title: Named in Settlement Flag
NamedInSettlement.description: A flag that indicates whether the Defendant or Respondent was named in the Final Order.

crs1_EnforcementConclusions.description: This section contains information about the conclusion(s) of the civil enforcement case, where it resulted in an order, consent decree, or other enforceable settlement.

EnforcementConclusionId.title: Enforcement Conclusion ID
EnforcementConclusionId.description: The system-generated unique identifier of the Final Order to which the Compliance Action belongs.

EnforcementConclusionType.title: Enforcement Conclusion Type
EnforcementConclusionType.example: Administrative Penalty Order With or Without Injunctive Relief
EnforcementConclusionType.description: A description of the enforcement instrument used by EPA to settle the case.

EnforcementConclusionName.title: Enforcement Conclusion Name
EnforcementConclusionName.description: The name of a Final Order associated with an Enforcement Action as assigned by the Lead EPA Attorney for federal actions.

FacilitiesInSettlement.title: Facilities in Settlement
FacilitiesInSettlement.description: The unique identification number assigned to a facility in the Facility Registry Service (FRS), for each facility included in the settlement.

SettlementEnteredDate.title: Settlement Entered Date
SettlementEnteredDate.description: The civil case date the Final Order is signed by the presiding Judge and entered by the Clerk of the Court; it is the date the Clerk stamps on the document.  For an Administrative Formal EA, this is the Final Order Issued Date; for a Judicial EA, this is the Final Order Entered Date.

SettlementLodgedDate.title: Settlement Lodged Date
SettlementLodgedDate.description: The date the settlement document is given to the Clerk of the Court for lodging in the District Court; it is the date the Clerk stamps on the document. (Federal Judicial EAs only).

FederalPenalty.title: Federal Penalty
FederalPenalty.description: For civil judicial Enforcement Actions, this amount is the Federal penalty assessed against the defendant(s) as specified in the final entered Consent Decree or Court Order.  For administrative Enforcement Actions, it is the penalty assessed in the Consent/Final Order.  It does not include the amount of the penalty mitigated due to a SEP or the amount shared with the state or local entities.  Interest payments associated with a penalty paid over time are not to be included in this amount.  It is the total Federal amount for each Final Order.

StatePenalty.title: State Penalty
StatePenalty.description: The dollar penalty amount to be paid to a state or local enforcement authority that is party to a concluded enforcement action.

SEPCost.title: Supplemental Environmental Projects Cost
SEPCost.description: The total value of all SEPs for all settlements at the enforcement case.

ComplianceActionCost.title: Compliance Action Cost
ComplianceActionCost.description: The total value of all SEPs for all settlements at the enforcement case.

EnforcementActionClosedDate.title: Enforcement Action Closed Date
EnforcementActionClosedDate.description: The date the actions requested in the final order have been completed by the recipient; or the termination date of the final order (if such a date is specified) has passed; or the enforcement action has been withdrawn or dismissed; or the enforcement action has been superseded by, or combined into, another related enforcement action addressing the same violations.

ActualTerminationDate.description: The date on which the Final Order was terminated.

CostRecovery.title: Cost Recovery Amount
CostRecovery.description: For civil enforcement actions, cost recovery awarded is the amount of cost recovery ordered or agreed to be repaid by the responsible party of parties.

crs1_Facilities.description: This section provides detailed facility and address information on all of the facilities associated with the civil enforcement case.

FRSNumber.title: FRS Number
FRSNumber.description: The identification number assigned to a facility in the Facility Registry Service (FRS) to uniquely identify a facility site.

FacilityAddress.title: Facility Address
FacilityAddress.description: The address that describes the physical (geographic) location of the front door or main entrance of a Facility site, including urban-style street address or rural address.

FacilityCity.title: Facility City
FacilityCity.description: The city in which the facility is located

FacilityState.title: Facility State
FacilityState.description: The state in which the facility is located

FacilityZip.title: Facility Zipcode
FacilityZip.description: The zip code of the area in which the facility is located

SICCodes.title: SIC Codes
SICCodes.description: The Standard Industrial Classification codes applicable to the facility

NAICSCodes.title: NAICS Codes
NAICSCodes.description: A 6-digit code to classify industrial establishments. For detailed information about NAICS, please refer to the U.S. Census Bureau NAICS webpage.

crs1_FinalOrderStatuses.description: This section provides the compliance status for a subset of EPA judicial consent decrees with compliance schedules requiring more than three years to complete.

FiscalYear.title: Fiscal Year
FiscalYear.description: The fiscal year in which the activity occurred.

Q4StatusDescription.title: Quarter 4 Status Description
Q4StatusDescription.description: The relevant status for the quarter.

Q3StatusDescription.title: Quarter 3 Status Description
Q3StatusDescription.description: The relevant status for the quarter.

Q2StatusDescription.title: Quarter 2 Status Description
Q2StatusDescription.description: The relevant status for the quarter.

Q1StatusDescription.title: Quarter 1 Status Description
Q1StatusDescription.description: The relevant status for the quarter.

crs1_LawsAndSections.description: Identifies the statute/law and sections cited in the enforcement action.

Law.title: Law
Law.description: Code for the primary and non-primary laws that were violated.

Programs.title: Programs
Programs.description: A description of the EPA program(s) under which an enforcement action has been taken, and which correspond to the cited statutes and sections.

crs1_PollutantReductions.description: This section provides information relating complying actions and SEPs to their estimated or actual environmental impact on pollutant reduction.

ComplyingActionId.title: Complying Action ID
ComplyingActionId.description: The unique identifier for an enforceable requirement obliging the defendant/respondent to take or refrain from certain specified actions.

EnvironmentalImpactId.title: Environmental Impact ID
EnvironmentalImpactId.description: The system-generated unique identifier of the Environmental Impact record.

SEPId.title: Supplemental Environmental Projects ID
SEPId.description: The system-generated unique identifier of the SEP record affiliated with the Environmental Impact.

Pollutant.title: Pollutant
Pollutant.description: The name that EPA has selected as its preferred name for a substance (also known as registry name). If the registry name is not available, use the systematic name instead.

AnnualAmount.description: The amount of reduction or elimination of each pollutant or waste in pounds, kilograms, or liquid measure that resulted from the SEP or Complying Actions.

Units.title: Units
Units.description: A code that uniquely identifies the pollutant unit of measurement.

Media.title: Pollutant Media
Media.description: The name/description of the media where the pollutants or waste were emitted/discharged.

SEPorComp.description: A flag that indicates whether the quantitative environmental impact pertains to a SEP or Complying Action.

crs1_Pollutants.description: The common name identifying the pollutant, waste material, substance, or chemical reduced.

PollutantName.title: Pollutant Name
PollutantName.description: The name designating the waste material substance or chemical involved at the facility that has a Quantitative Environmental Impact addressed in the SEP or Complying Actions.

ChemicalAbstractNumber.title: Chemical Abstract Number
ChemicalAbstractNumber.description: This is the unique number assigned to a chemical substance by the Chemical Abstracts Service.

crs1_ProgramLinks.description: Crosswalk between programs and facilities (identified by FRS ID).

FRSNumber.title: FRS Number
FRSNumber.description: The identification number assigned to a facility in the Facility Registry Service (FRS) to uniquely identify a facility site.

Program.title: Program
Program.description: The source database for the EPA programs information.

ProgramID.title: Program ID
ProgramID.description: Unique identifier for the EPA program.

crs1_RelatedActivities.description: This section provides an Activity Type description and date for other ICIS activities (e.g., inspections, or compliance assistance) that are linked to the enforcement action.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: A description of the category of Supplemental Environment Project (SEP) for a settlement.

ActualDate.description: The actual date on which the event was completed/achieved.

crs1_Results.description: The data returned by the service call.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

RelatedActivities.title: Related Activities
RelatedActivities.description: This section provides an Activity Type description and date for other ICIS activities (e.g., inspections, or compliance assistance) that are linked to the enforcement action.

crs1_SupplementalEnvironmentalProjects.description: As part of a settlement, a defendant may voluntarily agree to undertake an environmentally beneficial project (Supplement Environmental Project) related to the violation in exchange for mitigation of the penalty to be paid. It does not include activities a defendant must take to return to compliance with the law. A single settlement may have multiple SEPs.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: A code that uniquely identifies a category of Supplemental Environment Project (SEP) for a settlement (e.g., Assessments and Audits, Environmental Compliance Promotion, Emergency Planning and Preparedness, Environmental Restoration).

Description.title: Description
Description.description: A description of the category of Supplemental Environment Project (SEP) for a settlement.

SEPId.title: Supplemental Environmental Projects ID
SEPId.description: The system-generated unique identifier of the SEP record affiliated with the Environmental Impact.

SEPText.title: Supplemental Environmental Projects Text'
SEPText.description: The free-form textual description used to further describe the SEP.

SEPAmount.title: Supplemental Environmental Projects Amount
SEPAmount.description: The cost applied to the type(s) of environmentally beneficial projects which a defendant/respondent agree to undertake in settlement of an enforcement action, but which the defendant/respondent is not otherwise legally required to perform.

crs2_Results.description: The data returned by the service call.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

JDCRows.title: Judicial Cases Row Count
JDCRows.description: Displays the number of Judicial cases within the search results.

AFRRows.description: Displays the number of Administrative Formal cases within the search results.

FedPenRows.description: Displays the number of cases with federal penalty assessed greater than $0.

SEPRows.description: Displays the number of cases with SEP amount greater than $0.

CriminalRows.title: Count of Criminal Cases
CriminalRows.description: Displays the number of criminal enforcement cases within the search results.

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

PageNo.title: Page Number
PageNo.description: The number of pages of results returned

Cases.title: Cases
Cases.description: A summary of the violation(s), environmental problem(s), and a description of the cause of action.

crs3_CRDefendants.description: Provides identifying information about the defendants and courts involved in the criminal enforcement case.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: The name of the case assigned to the enforcement action by the lead attorney. Generally, the primary defendant's name is used as the case name. For civil CERCLA cases, the facility/site name may be used.

DefendantType.title: Defendent Type
DefendantType.description: The role of each defendant in the criminal enforcement case, either Principal Defendant or Defendant. Multiple defendants (up to fourteen) may be associated with one case, but only one is designated as principal.

District.title: Court District
District.description: The United States district courts are the trial courts of the federal court system.

State.title: State
State.description: The two letter abbreviation that represents the state or state equivalent for the U.S.

DocketNumber.title: Court Docket Number
DocketNumber.description: The number the Clerk of the Court assigned to the case that is filed or to a consent decree when it is lodged. For administrative cases, this number is assigned to the case by the Regional Hearing Clerk.

crs3_CRDetails.description: A list of the violation(s), environmental problem(s), and a description of the cause of action organized by date of occurrence. The case details walk through each step of the case activities and displayed the date on which each occurred.

DetailDate.title: Detail Date
DetailDate.description: The date associated with an enforcement action case detail.

DetailDesc.title: Detail Description
DetailDesc.description: The description of an enforcement action case detail.

DetailCitations.title: Detail Citations
DetailCitations.description: The corresponding regulation in the Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) or U.S. Code (U.S.C.) associated with the enforcement action case detail.

crs3_CaseInformation.description: The basic information section contains information that identifies the action and some key descriptive variables, such as case status and case type.

CaseIdentifier.title: Case Identifier
CaseIdentifier.description: A unique number identifying the enforcement action. For EPA civil cases, these numbers begin with either the two digit EPA Region Code, "HQ" (headquarters initiated cases), and "EF" or "WF" (Eastern or Western Field Office CAA Mobile Source Program cases); followed by the fiscal year in which the action was initiated.

FiscalYear.title: Fiscal Year
FiscalYear.description: The fiscal year in which the activity occurred.

Citations.title: Citations
Citations.description: The corresponding regulation in the Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) or U.S. Code (U.S.C.) associated with the enforcement action.

CaseSummary.title: Case Summary
CaseSummary.description: The summary of the violation environmental problem and a description of the cause of action (basis of legal action).  The summary could be extracted from the referral transmission memo or letter or it could be required as the first section of a revised standardized referral document.

crs3_Locations.description: This section provides geographic locational information for the criminal activity.

City.title: City
City.description: The name of the city, town, village or other locality, when identifiable, within whose boundaries (the majority of) the facility site is located. This is not always the same as the city used for USPS mail delivery.

State.title: State
State.description: The two letter abbreviation that represents the state or state equivalent for the U.S.

County.title: County
County.description: The name of the county, when identifiable, within whose boundaries (the majority of) the criminal activity was located. The county was derived in ECHO based on the latitude and longitude provided in the Summary of Criminal Prosecutions database.

Zip.title: Zip Code
Zip.description: US postal ZIP code, as maintained by ICIS.

EPARegion.title: EPA Region
EPARegion.description: The EPA region in which the facility is located

Latitude.title: Latitude
Latitude.description: The latitude of the facility or permit holder as maintained in each data system.

Longitude.title: Longitude
Longitude.description: The longitude of the facility or permit holder as maintained in each data system

crs3_Results.description: The data returned by the service call.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

crs5_Results.description: The data returned by the service call.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

PageNo.title: Page Number
PageNo.description: The number of pages of results returned

Cases.title: Cases
Cases.description: A summary of the violation(s), environmental problem(s), and a description of the cause of action.

EPASystem.title: EPA Data System
EPASystem.description:
The EPA data system in which permit and facility records are kept. EPA's Facility Registry System (FRS) links all program database records (such as permit IDs and IDs facilities use in reporting to EPA) together. The following list describes the individual data systems that are linked to from the detailed facility report: 

- AFS: Air Facility System for Clean Air Act stationary source programs.
- ICP: Integrated Compliance Information System for Clean Water Act programs monitoring National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permits.
- RCR: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Information System (RCRAInfo) for tracking the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA) programs.
- NCDB: National Compliance Database System for monitoring national performance of the Toxic Substance Control Act (TSCA); the Emergency Planning and Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (EPCRA); the Asbestos Hazard Emergency Response (AHERA); and the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA).
- TRI: Toxics Release Inventory for Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 submissions.
- NEI: National Emissions Inventory database contains information on stationary and mobile sources that emit criteria air pollutants and their precursors, as well as hazardous air pollutants (HAPs). The database includes estimates of annual emissions, by source, of air pollutants in each area of the country, on an annual basis.
- TSCA: Toxic Substances Control Act addressing the production, importation, use, and disposal of specific chemicals.

RegistryID.title: FRS ID
RegistryID.description: An internal 12-digit Facility Registry Service (FRS) tracking number used to tie all facility data together in EPA regulatory program databases.

Statute.title: Regulatory Statute
Statute.description:
The name of the statute associated with each of the permits and identifiers linked to the facility: 
- CAA = the Clean Air Act
- CWA = the Clean Water Act
- RCRA = the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act
- EP313 = the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (also known as the Toxics Release Inventory Program)
- TSCA = the Toxic Substances Control Act
- SDWA = the Safe Drinking Water Act

CWPName.title: Facility Name
CWPName.description: Facility or permit holder name, as maintained in ICIS-NPDES.

CWPCity.title: City
CWPCity.description: City in which the facility is located.

CWPStateDistrict.description: The State Congressional District the facility is located within.

CWPCounty.title: County
CWPCounty.description: County in which the facility is located.

CWPEPARegion.title: EPA Region
CWPEPARegion.description: The EPA region where the facility is located. EPA has 10 regional offices that execute programs within several states and territories.

CWPStatus.title: Current Compliance Status
CWPStatus.description:
An indication of the facility's current compliance status under the Clean Water Act:
- Significant Violation
- Noncompliance
- No Violation
- Unknown

CWPIndianCntryFlg.title: In Indian Country
CWPIndianCntryFlg.description: Displays "Y" if a facility is located in Indian country.

CWPVersionNmbr.title: Permit Version Number
CWPVersionNmbr.description: The version number of the facility's NPDES permit.

CWPPermitStatusCode.title: Permit Status (Code)
CWPPermitStatusCode.description: The code associated with the facility's NPDES permit status.

CWPPermitStatusDesc.title: Permit Status Description
CWPPermitStatusDesc.description: The current stage/status in the NPDES permit life cycle.

CWPPermitTypeCode.title: Permit Type (Code)
CWPPermitTypeCode.description: The code associated with the facility's NPDES permit classification.

CWPPermitTypeDesc.title: Permit Type Description
CWPPermitTypeDesc.description:
NPDES facility permit classification:
- NPDES Individual Permit
- General Permit Covered Facility
- NPDES Master General Permit
- Associated Permit Record
- Individual Industrial User Permit
- Individual State Issued Permit
- State Issued Master General Permit
- Unpermitted Facility

CWPFacilityTypeIndicator.title: Facility Type
CWPFacilityTypeIndicator.description: Each National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permit is defined by the program office as a Major or non-major discharger. This field also indicates the permit type.

CWPMajorMinorStatusFlag.title: Major/Minor Status Flag
CWPMajorMinorStatusFlag.description:
Facilities marked "M" for major refers to CWA major permittees.
- M = Major
- N = Minor

FacPercentMinority.title: Facility Percent Minority
FacPercentMinority.description: Percent Minority is the percentage of the population of the given area that is considered minority. Statistics are shown for the area within a 3-mile radius of each facility.

FacPopDen.title: Facility Population Density
FacPopDen.description: The number of persons per square mile in the area being profiled. This field is the ratio of total persons (displayed in the Total Persons field) to total land area (displayed in the Land Area field).

FacFederalAgencyCode.title: Facility Federal Agency Code
FacFederalAgencyCode.description: Indicates the federal agency, as classified in FRS. Federal agencies are installations that are owned and operated by the U.S. government. The five-character code consists of a letter followed by four numbers. There are four possible letters that can occupy the first character position: C = Civilian Federal Agency; D = Department of Defense; E = Department of Energy; X = Unknown. The second and third characters represent the agency code, while the fourth and fifth characters represent the bureau code.

CWPCurrentSNCStatus.description: The type of noncompliance when a major source is in significant violation or a minor source has a Category 1 violation.

CWPSNCEventDesc.description: Describes the event that resulted in the facility's status of Significant Noncompliance.

CWPCurrentSNCStatusDate.description: The status date of the facility's Significant Noncompliance designation.

CWPQtrsInNC.description: Count of the number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the permit or site is considered either with violations, in non-compliance (NC) status, or in Significant Non-compliance (SNC), as described above under Current Compliance Status.

CWPCurrentViol.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is currently in any violation under the Clean Water Act, either in Noncompliance or Significant Noncompliance.

CWPQtrsInSNC.description: Count of the number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the permit is considered in Significant Non-compliance (SNC).

CWPInspectionCount.title: Inspections (5 yrs)
CWPInspectionCount.description: The number of inspections/compliance evaluations, under the corresponding statute, occurring at the facility within the last five years.

CWPDateLastInspection.title: Date of Last Inspection
CWPDateLastInspection.description: The date on which the most recent inspection of the facility took place. For the CAA, the date on which a Full Compliance Evaluation (FCE) was completed.

CWPDateLastInformalEa.title: Date of Last Informal Enf Action
CWPDateLastInformalEa.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility within the last five years.

CWPInformalEnfActCount.title: Information Enforcement Actions (5 yrs)
CWPInformalEnfActCount.description: Indicates the total number of informal enforcement actions/notices of violations (NOVs) taken against the facility within the last five years.

FacLat.title: Latitude
FacLat.description: The latitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

FacLong.title: Longitude
FacLong.description: The longitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

FacUsMexBorderFlg.title: Near US-Mexico Border
FacUsMexBorderFlg.description: A Y/N flag indicating that the facility is within 100KM of the US-Mexico Border.

CWPImpWaterFlg.title: Impaired Water Body
CWPImpWaterFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the permitted facility discharges directly into category 4 or 5 impaired waters, as designated under section 303(d) of the Clean Water Act.

FacDerivedHuc.title: Watershed (HUC Code)
FacDerivedHuc.description: The 8-digit Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC) of the watershed in which the facility resides. A HUC number is assigned to every watershed in the nation and uniquely identifies the watershed.

FacMapFlg.title: Facility Mapped Flag
FacMapFlg.description: Graphical indicator denoting whether geographical data required to map a facility are available.

FacMapIcon.title: Facility Map Icon
FacMapIcon.description: The default map icon image file calculated for the facility by the ECHO program.

FacFIPSCode.title: FIPS Code
FacFIPSCode.description: The 2-digit Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code to identify the county that a facility is located in.

CWPE90Cnt.title: Effluent Violations (5 yrs)
CWPE90Cnt.description: Displays the number of instances where effluent limits have been exceeded in the past 3 years (E90 compliance code), based on monthly Discharge Monitoring Reports (DMRs) submitted by facilities.

CWPCsoFlag.title: Combined Sewer Overflows (CSOs)?
CWPCsoFlag.description: The discharge from a Combined Sewer System at a point prior to the treatment plant. CSOs are point sources subject to NPDES permit requirements including both technology-based and water quality-based requirements of the Clean Water Act.

CWPCsoOutfalls.title: CSO Outfalls
CWPCsoOutfalls.description: The number of discharge outfalls at points prior to the treatment plant.

CWPFormalEaCnt.description: Indicates the total number of enforcement actions taken against the facility within the last five years. "NA" indicates that this measure is not applicable for facilities with no associated CAA, CWA, or RCRA permits.

CWPDateLastFea.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility within the last five years.

CWPDateLastFeaSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state environmental agency within the last five years.

CWPDateLastFeaEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility by EPA within the last five years.

CWPDateLastIeaSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state environmental agency within the last five years.

CWPDateLastIeaEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility by EPA within the last five years.

CWPDateLastInspEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent inspection taken against the facility by EPA within the last five years.

CWPDateLastInspSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent inspection taken against the facility by a state environmental agency within the last five years.

CWPDateLastPenalty.description: Indicates date of most recent penalty against the facility within the last five years.

CWPComplianceTracking.description: Extent to which data is being entered and effluent exceedances are being identified (Off, On, Partial).

FacTRIReporter.title: Facility TRI Reporter
FacTRIReporter.description: Indicates whether facility reported to the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) for the most recent reporting year.

FacTRISwRel.description: Chemical surface water release information from the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) represents the total chemical releases discharged to surface water, in pounds, for the most recent reporting year.

FacTRIPotwTrans.description: POTW transfer information from the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) represents the amount of toxic chemicals transferred to a Publicly Operated Treatment Works (POTW), in pounds, for the most recent reporting year.

CWP13qtrsComplStatus.description: Each letter indicates the compliance status for the corresponding quarter.

CWPDaysLastInspection.description: Indicates the number of days since the most recent inspection of the facility. Inspections listed within the last five years are included.

CWPSicCodes.title: SIC Code
CWPSicCodes.description: Indicates the facility's or permit's primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code.

CWPNaicsCodes.title: NAICS Code
CWPNaicsCodes.description: Indicates the facility's or permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code.

CWPCaseIDs.description: Indicates the ICIS Case Number, a unique number identifying the civil enforcement action.

CWPTotalDesignFlowNmbr.description: The amount of wastewater flow in million gallons per day (MGD) that the facility is designed for.

CWPActualAverageFlowNmbr.description: The actual amount of the facility's wastewater flow measured in million gallons per day (MGD).

CWPStateWaterBodyCode.description:
Code from the Assessment TMDL Tracking & Implementation System (ATTAINS) database, assigned by the US Geological Survey, used to classify watersheds in the United States and the Caribbean. The code consists of twelve digits which correspond to six levels of classification:
- Region (first-level, 2-digit HUC)
- Subregion (second-level, 4-digit HUC)
- Accounting unit (third-level, 6-digit HUC)
- Cataloguing unit (fourth-level, 8-digit HUC)
- Watershed (fifth-level, 10-digit HUC)
- Subwatershed (sixth-level, 12-digit HUC)

CWPStateWaterBodyName.description: The name of the watershed from the ATTAINS database in which the facility resides.

AttainsCycleYear.title: ATTAINS Cycle Year
AttainsCycleYear.description: The year in which the most recent state assessment occurred for the waterbody. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

RadGnisName.title: Reach Address Database GNIS Name
RadGnisName.description: The name of the waterbody from the Geographic Names Information System (GNIS) database in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly.

RadReachcode.title: Reach Address Database Reach Code
RadReachcode.description: A nationally unique and permanent identifier for the waterbody, assigned by the US Geological Survey.

RadWBDHuc12.title: Reach Address Database Watershed Boundary Dataset HUC12 Code
RadWBDHuc12.description:
Code from the Reach Address Database (RAD), assigned by the US Geological Survey, used to classify watersheds in the United States and the Caribbean. The code consists of twelve digits which correspond to six levels of classification:
- Region (first-level, 2-digit HUC)
- Subregion (second-level, 4-digit HUC)
- Accounting unit (third-level, 6-digit HUC)
- Cataloguing unit (fourth-level, 8-digit HUC)
- Watershed (fifth-level, 10-digit HUC)
- Subwatershed (sixth-level, 12-digit HUC)

RadHu12Name.title: Reach Address Database HUC12 Name
RadHu12Name.description: The name of the waterbody in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly (from the Reach Address Database, RAD).

AttainsSource.title: ATTAINS Source
AttainsSource.description: The CWA Report in which the waterbody data can be found. The data are from the Assessment TMDL Tracking & Implementation System (ATTAINS) database.

AttainsImpWaterFlg.title: ATTAINS Impaired Water Flag
AttainsImpWaterFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is listed for impairment. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsAuCategory.title: ATTAINS Assessment Unit Category
AttainsAuCategory.description:
The impairment class or category of the waterbody in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly. The data are from the ATTAINS database:
- 5  = Impaired: TMDL needed. Available information indicates that at least one designated use is not being supported and a TMDL is needed (also known as the 303(d) listed waters).
- 4  = Impaired: TMDL not needed. Available information indicates that at least one designated use is not being supported, but a TMDL is not needed (see subcategories).
- 4a = TMDL completed. A TMDL has been completed, but impairment still exists.
- 4b = TMDL alternative. Impairment is being addressed by a method other than a TMDL (e.g., stream bank improvements).
- 4c = Non-pollutant causes. Cause of impairment is not a pollutant (e.g., habitat destruction).

AttainsAquaticLifeUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Aquatic Life Use Flag
AttainsAquaticLifeUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for aquatic life use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsExceptnlUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Exceptional Use Flag
AttainsExceptnlUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for exceptional use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsRecreationUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Recreational Use Flag
AttainsRecreationUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for recreational use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsShellfishUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Shellfish Use Flag
AttainsShellfishUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for shellfish use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsStateCauses.title: ATTAINS State Causes
AttainsStateCauses.description: Lists all pollutants or stressors that are causing impairment in the assessed waterbody. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsCauseGroups.title: ATTAINS Cause Groups
AttainsCauseGroups.description: Lists all groups of pollutants or stressors that are causing impairment in the assessed waterbody. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsPossibleNPDESParams.title: ATTAINS Possible NPDES Parameters
AttainsPossibleNPDESParams.description: Lists all pollutants discharged by the facility that are potentially contributing to the impairment of local waterbodies.

BeachCloseLastYearFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is located on or near a waterbody with a beach closure within the last year.

BeachCloseLast2yrsFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is located on or near a waterbody with a beach closure within the last two years.

ChesapeakeBayFlag.title: Chesapeake Bay Flag
ChesapeakeBayFlag.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is located within the Chesapeake Bay watershed.

RCRAIDs.title: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act IDs
RCRAIDs.description: A unique 12-character ID assigned for each record/permit/site/facility within the RCRAInfo database.

TRIIDs.title: Toxics Release Inventory Program IDs
TRIIDs.description: A unique 15-character ID assigned for each facility within the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) program. The format is ZZZZZNNNNNSSSSS, where ZZZZZ = ZIP code, NNNNN = the first 5 consonants of the name, and SSSSS = the first 5 non-blank non-special characters in the street address.

SDWAIDs.description: A unique 9-character ID assigned for each public water system within the Safe Drinking Water Information System (SDWIS).

PollInViolation.title: Pollutants with Reporting Violations
PollInViolation.example: Chlorine|Flow, in conduit or thru treatment plant|Oil and grease|Solids, total suspended|Thermal Discharge|pH
PollInViolation.description: The names of pollutants with reporting violations (i.e., violation codes D80 and D90) or effluent exceedances (i.e., violation code E90) in the past three years in ICIS-NPDES.

DmrPounds.description: Total pounds of pollutants discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year.

DmrTwpe.description: Total toxic-weighted pounds equivalent (TWPE) discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year. TWPE is the mass of a pollutant or chemical discharged that accounts for its relative toxicity.

DmrImpairedPoll.example: Mercury | Oil and grease | Solids, total suspended | Temperature, water deg. centigrade | Temperature, water deg. fahrenheit | pH
DmrImpairedPoll.description: The pollutants with limits or monitoring requirements in a facility's NPDES permit with the potential to contribute to impairment of local waterbodies

CurrSvFlag.title: Current Significant Violation Flag
CurrSvFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current significant violation. 1 = Yes

ViolFlag.title: Violation Flag
ViolFlag.description: Indicates if the facility had a violation within the last 3 years. 1 = Yes

CurrVioFlag.title: Current Violation Flag
CurrVioFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a current violation. 1 = Yes

Insp5yrFlag.title: Inspected Within Last Five Years Flag
Insp5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an inspection within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Ea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has a formal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes

Infea5yrFlag.description: Indicates if the facility has an informal enforcement action within the last 5 years. 1 = Yes.

CWPTotalPenalties.description: The total penalty value incurred over 5 years.

CensusBlockGroup.title: Census Block Group
CensusBlockGroup.description: A geographic unit used by the United States Census Bureau, generally defined to contain between 600 and 3,000 people.

PctilePctpre1960Us.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Lead paint indicator.

PctileDpmUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN diesel particulate matter indicator.

PctileCancerUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA air toxics cancer risk indicator.

PctileRespUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN NATA respiratory hazard index indicator.

PctileTrafficScoreUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN Traffic proximity and volume indicator.

PctileProximityNPDESUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to major direct water dischargers indicator.

PctileProximityNplUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to National Priorities List (NPL) sites indicator.

PctileProximityRmpUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Risk Management Plan (RMP) sites indicator.

PctileProximityTsdfUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN proximity to Treatment Storage and Disposal Facilities (TSDFs) indicator.

PctileO3Us.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN ozone indicator.

PctilePmUs.description: The national percentile of the census block group for the EJSCREEN particulate matter indicator.

MaxPctileUs.description: The maximum percentile from all individual EJSCREEN indicators.

Lower48.title: Contiguous United States Flag
Lower48.description: Flag showing Y/N whether location is within the contiguous (lower 48) United States.

MasterExternalPermitNmbr.title: Master External Permit Number
MasterExternalPermitNmbr.description: This is the unique identifier for the Master General Permit for a General Permit Covered Facility.

IssuingAgency.title: Permit Issuing Agency
IssuingAgency.description: This is the name of the organization issuing or granting a permit.

SpeciesCriticalHabitalFlag.description: This identifies if Endangered Species Act (ESA) provisions are met.

ReceivingMs4Name.title: Receiving MS4 Name
ReceivingMs4Name.description: This is the name of the receiving MS4(s).

SwpppUrl.description: Web address URL of Internet page where current copy of Stormwater Pollution Prevention Plan (SWPPP) is maintained.

ExposedActivity.description: Description of onsite industrial activities exposed to stormwater and potential spill and leak areas.

AssociatedPollutant.description: Description of pollutant(s) or pollutant constituent(s) associated with each industrial activity exposed to stormwater.

ControlMeasure.title: Control Measure
ControlMeasure.description: Description of control measures employed to comply with the non-numeric technology-based effluent limits required in Part 2.1.2 and Part 8.

ControlMeasureSchedule.title: Control Measure Schedule
ControlMeasureSchedule.description: Description of schedule for control measures associated with good housekeeping and maintenance.

FacIndianCntryFlg.title: Facility Indian Country Flag
FacIndianCntryFlg.description: Flag showing Y/N whether the facility is located in Indian Country.

ReferencePoint.title: Reference Point
ReferencePoint.example: ENTRANCE POINT OF A FACILITY OR STATION

LAT.title: Latitude
LAT.description: The latitude of the facility in degrees, to four decimal places

LON.title: Longitude
LON.description: The longitude of the facility in degrees, to four decimal places

ICON.title: Icon
ICON.description: Name of each individual icon file within the URL base

TYPE.title: Type
TYPE.description: For DFR, this is always facility

NAME.title: Name
NAME.description: For DFR, this is the Facility name. The name corresponds to the TYPE value

PUV.title: Popup Value
PUV.description: Pop up value. Combine with PopUpBaseURL to give the popup for the facility

CWAstatus.description: Quarterly compliance status for the most recent 13 quarters. Each letter indicates the compliance status for the corresponding quarter.

LastInsp.title: Last Inspection
LastInsp.description: The unique identifier for the last inspection

FormalCount.title: Formal Count
FormalCount.description: The number of formal enforcement actions that have been taken against the facility

InformalCount.title: Informal Count
InformalCount.description: The number of informal enforcement actions that have been taken against the facility

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

IconBaseURL.title: Icon Base URL
IconBaseURL.description: URL where all the icons are located

PopUpBaseURL.title: Popup Base URL
PopUpBaseURL.description: Combine this URL with the PUC to get popup info

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Field to record messages (typically performance-related) about packet processing

Version.title: Version
Version.description: Version of the SDWA system service

IndianCountryRows.title: Indian Country Row Count
IndianCountryRows.description: Number of facilities with tribal_flag populated

SVRows.title: Significant Violation Result Count
SVRows.description: Number of facilities with curr_sv_flag populated (CWP_STATUS = "Significant Violation")

CVRows.description: Summary count of the number of CWA facilities or SDWA public drinking water systems with current violations.

V3Rows.description: Number of facilities having one or more quarters in non-compliance (QNC) in the last three years

FEARows.description: Summary count of the number of facilities with a formal enforcement action in the past five years

InfFEARows.description: Number of facilities with infea_5yr_flag populated (INFORMAL_ENF_ACT_COUNT > 0)

INSPRows.description: Number of facilities with insp_5yr_flag populated (CWP_DATE_LAST_INSPECTION)

TotalPenalties.title: Total Penalties
TotalPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of either assessed or final penalties within the five year time period

QueryID.title: Query Identifier
QueryID.description: Sequential number assigned to entire search result

PageNo.title: Page Number
PageNo.description: The number of pages of results returned

ObjectId.title: Object Identifier
ObjectId.description: Sequential number assigned to each facility returned

ClusterLatitude.title: Cluster Latitude
ClusterLatitude.description: The latitude in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum.

ClusterLongitude.title: Cluster Longitude
ClusterLongitude.description: The longitude in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum.

IndianCountryRows.title: Indian Country Row Count
IndianCountryRows.description: Number of facilities with tribal_flag populated

EPARegionCode.title: EPA Region Code
EPARegionCode.description: The EPA region where the facility is located. EPA has 10 regional offices that execute programs within several states and territories

SVRows.title: Significant Violation Result Count
SVRows.description: Number of facilities with curr_sv_flag populated (CWP_STATUS = "Significant Violation")

CVRows.description: Summary count of the number of CWA facilities or SDWA public drinking water systems with current violations.

V3Rows.description: Number of facilities having one or more quarters in non-compliance (QNC) in the last three years

FEARows.description: Summary count of the number of facilities with a formal enforcement action in the past five years

InfFEARows.description: Number of facilities with infea_5yr_flag populated (INFORMAL_ENF_ACT_COUNT > 0)

INSPRows.description: Number of facilities with insp_5yr_flag populated (CWP_DATE_LAST_INSPECTION)

TotalPenalties.title: Total Penalties
TotalPenalties.description: The total dollar amount of either assessed or final penalties within the five year time period

ObjectId.title: Object Identifier
ObjectId.description: Sequential number assigned to each facility returned

EPASystem.title: EPA Data System
EPASystem.description:
The EPA data system in which permit and facility records are kept. EPA's Facility Registry System (FRS) links all program database records (such as permit IDs and IDs facilities use in reporting to EPA) together. The following list describes the individual data systems that are linked to from the detailed facility report: 

- AFS: Air Facility System for Clean Air Act stationary source programs.
- ICP: Integrated Compliance Information System for Clean Water Act programs monitoring National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permits.
- RCR: Resource Conservation and Recovery Act Information System (RCRAInfo) for tracking the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA) programs.
- NCDB: National Compliance Database System for monitoring national performance of the Toxic Substance Control Act (TSCA); the Emergency Planning and Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (EPCRA); the Asbestos Hazard Emergency Response (AHERA); and the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act (FIFRA).
- TRI: Toxics Release Inventory for Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 submissions.
- NEI: National Emissions Inventory database contains information on stationary and mobile sources that emit criteria air pollutants and their precursors, as well as hazardous air pollutants (HAPs). The database includes estimates of annual emissions, by source, of air pollutants in each area of the country, on an annual basis.
- TSCA: Toxic Substances Control Act addressing the production, importation, use, and disposal of specific chemicals.

RegistryID.title: FRS ID
RegistryID.description: An internal 12-digit Facility Registry Service (FRS) tracking number used to tie all facility data together in EPA regulatory program databases.

Statute.title: Regulatory Statute
Statute.description:
The name of the statute associated with each of the permits and identifiers linked to the facility: 
- CAA = the Clean Air Act
- CWA = the Clean Water Act
- RCRA = the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act
- EP313 = the Emergency Planning and Community Right-to-Know Act, Section 313 (also known as the Toxics Release Inventory Program)
- TSCA = the Toxic Substances Control Act
- SDWA = the Safe Drinking Water Act

CWPName.title: Facility Name
CWPName.description: Facility or permit holder name, as maintained in ICIS-NPDES.

CWPCity.title: City
CWPCity.description: City in which the facility is located.

CWPStateDistrict.description: The State Congressional District the facility is located within.

CWPCounty.title: County
CWPCounty.description: County in which the facility is located.

CWPEPARegion.title: EPA Region
CWPEPARegion.description: The EPA region where the facility is located. EPA has 10 regional offices that execute programs within several states and territories.

CWPStatus.title: Current Compliance Status
CWPStatus.description:
An indication of the facility's current compliance status under the Clean Water Act:
- Significant Violation
- Noncompliance
- No Violation
- Unknown

CWPIndianCntryFlg.title: In Indian Country
CWPIndianCntryFlg.description: Displays "Y" if a facility is located in Indian country.

CWPVersionNmbr.title: Permit Version Number
CWPVersionNmbr.description: The version number of the facility's NPDES permit.

CWPPermitStatusCode.title: Permit Status (Code)
CWPPermitStatusCode.description: The code associated with the facility's NPDES permit status.

CWPPermitStatusDesc.title: Permit Status Description
CWPPermitStatusDesc.description: The current stage/status in the NPDES permit life cycle.

CWPPermitTypeCode.title: Permit Type (Code)
CWPPermitTypeCode.description: The code associated with the facility's NPDES permit classification.

CWPPermitTypeDesc.title: Permit Type Description
CWPPermitTypeDesc.description:
NPDES facility permit classification:
- NPDES Individual Permit
- General Permit Covered Facility
- NPDES Master General Permit
- Associated Permit Record
- Individual Industrial User Permit
- Individual State Issued Permit
- State Issued Master General Permit
- Unpermitted Facility

CWPFacilityTypeIndicator.title: Facility Type
CWPFacilityTypeIndicator.description: Each National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permit is defined by the program office as a Major or non-major discharger. This field also indicates the permit type.

CWPMajorMinorStatusFlag.title: Major/Minor Status Flag
CWPMajorMinorStatusFlag.description:
Facilities marked "M" for major refers to CWA major permittees.
- M = Major
- N = Minor

FacPercentMinority.title: Facility Percent Minority
FacPercentMinority.description: Percent Minority is the percentage of the population of the given area that is considered minority. Statistics are shown for the area within a 3-mile radius of each facility.

FacPopDen.title: Facility Population Density
FacPopDen.description: The number of persons per square mile in the area being profiled. This field is the ratio of total persons (displayed in the Total Persons field) to total land area (displayed in the Land Area field).

FacFederalAgencyCode.title: Facility Federal Agency Code
FacFederalAgencyCode.description: Indicates the federal agency, as classified in FRS. Federal agencies are installations that are owned and operated by the U.S. government. The five-character code consists of a letter followed by four numbers. There are four possible letters that can occupy the first character position: C = Civilian Federal Agency; D = Department of Defense; E = Department of Energy; X = Unknown. The second and third characters represent the agency code, while the fourth and fifth characters represent the bureau code.

CWPCurrentSNCStatus.description: The type of noncompliance when a major source is in significant violation or a minor source has a Category 1 violation.

CWPSNCEventDesc.description: Describes the event that resulted in the facility's status of Significant Noncompliance.

CWPCurrentSNCStatusDate.description: The status date of the facility's Significant Noncompliance designation.

CWPQtrsInNC.description: Count of the number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the permit or site is considered either with violations, in non-compliance (NC) status, or in Significant Non-compliance (SNC), as described above under Current Compliance Status.

CWPCurrentViol.description: Displays "Y" if the facility is currently in any violation under the Clean Water Act, either in Noncompliance or Significant Noncompliance.

CWPQtrsInSNC.description: Count of the number of quarters, out of the last twelve quarters, in which the permit is considered in Significant Non-compliance (SNC).

CWPInspectionCount.title: Inspections (5 yrs)
CWPInspectionCount.description: The number of inspections/compliance evaluations, under the corresponding statute, occurring at the facility within the last five years.

CWPDateLastInspection.title: Date of Last Inspection
CWPDateLastInspection.description: The date on which the most recent inspection of the facility took place. For the CAA, the date on which a Full Compliance Evaluation (FCE) was completed.

CWPDateLastInformalEa.title: Date of Last Informal Enf Action
CWPDateLastInformalEa.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility within the last five years.

CWPInformalEnfActCount.title: Information Enforcement Actions (5 yrs)
CWPInformalEnfActCount.description: Indicates the total number of informal enforcement actions/notices of violations (NOVs) taken against the facility within the last five years.

FacLat.title: Latitude
FacLat.description: The latitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

FacLong.title: Longitude
FacLong.description: The longitude of the facility in decimal degrees expressed using the NAD83 horizontal datum. The coordinate comes from the FRS EPA Locational Reference Tables (LRT) file which represents the most accurate value for the facility based on the available spatial metadata.

FacUsMexBorderFlg.title: Near US-Mexico Border
FacUsMexBorderFlg.description: A Y/N flag indicating that the facility is within 100KM of the US-Mexico Border.

CWPImpWaterFlg.title: Impaired Water Body
CWPImpWaterFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the permitted facility discharges directly into category 4 or 5 impaired waters, as designated under section 303(d) of the Clean Water Act.

FacDerivedHuc.title: Watershed (HUC Code)
FacDerivedHuc.description: The 8-digit Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC) of the watershed in which the facility resides. A HUC number is assigned to every watershed in the nation and uniquely identifies the watershed.

FacMapFlg.title: Facility Mapped Flag
FacMapFlg.description: Graphical indicator denoting whether geographical data required to map a facility are available.

FacMapIcon.title: Facility Map Icon
FacMapIcon.description: The default map icon image file calculated for the facility by the ECHO program.

FacFIPSCode.title: FIPS Code
FacFIPSCode.description: The 2-digit Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) code to identify the county that a facility is located in.

CWPE90Cnt.title: Effluent Violations (5 yrs)
CWPE90Cnt.description: Displays the number of instances where effluent limits have been exceeded in the past 3 years (E90 compliance code), based on monthly Discharge Monitoring Reports (DMRs) submitted by facilities.

CWPCsoFlag.title: Combined Sewer Overflows (CSOs)?
CWPCsoFlag.description: The discharge from a Combined Sewer System at a point prior to the treatment plant. CSOs are point sources subject to NPDES permit requirements including both technology-based and water quality-based requirements of the Clean Water Act.

CWPCsoOutfalls.title: CSO Outfalls
CWPCsoOutfalls.description: The number of discharge outfalls at points prior to the treatment plant.

CWPFormalEaCnt.description: Indicates the total number of enforcement actions taken against the facility within the last five years. "NA" indicates that this measure is not applicable for facilities with no associated CAA, CWA, or RCRA permits.

CWPDateLastFea.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility within the last five years.

CWPDateLastFeaSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state environmental agency within the last five years.

CWPDateLastFeaEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed formal enforcement action taken against the facility by EPA within the last five years.

CWPDateLastIeaSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility by a state environmental agency within the last five years.

CWPDateLastIeaEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent listed informal enforcement action taken against the facility by EPA within the last five years.

CWPDateLastInspEPA.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent inspection taken against the facility by EPA within the last five years.

CWPDateLastInspSt.description: Indicates the effective date of the most recent inspection taken against the facility by a state environmental agency within the last five years.

CWPDateLastPenalty.description: Indicates date of most recent penalty against the facility within the last five years.

CWPComplianceTracking.description: Extent to which data is being entered and effluent exceedances are being identified (Off, On, Partial).

FacTRIReporter.title: Facility TRI Reporter
FacTRIReporter.description: Indicates whether facility reported to the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) for the most recent reporting year.

FacTRISwRel.description: Chemical surface water release information from the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) represents the total chemical releases discharged to surface water, in pounds, for the most recent reporting year.

FacTRIPotwTrans.description: POTW transfer information from the Toxics Release Inventory (TRI) represents the amount of toxic chemicals transferred to a Publicly Operated Treatment Works (POTW), in pounds, for the most recent reporting year.

CWP13qtrsComplStatus.description: Each letter indicates the compliance status for the corresponding quarter.

CWPDaysLastInspection.description: Indicates the number of days since the most recent inspection of the facility. Inspections listed within the last five years are included.

CWPSicCodes.title: SIC Code
CWPSicCodes.description: Indicates the facility's or permit's primary Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) Code.

CWPNaicsCodes.title: NAICS Code
CWPNaicsCodes.description: Indicates the facility's or permit's primary North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) Code.

CWPCaseIDs.description: Indicates the ICIS Case Number, a unique number identifying the civil enforcement action.

CWPTotalDesignFlowNmbr.description: The amount of wastewater flow in million gallons per day (MGD) that the facility is designed for.

CWPActualAverageFlowNmbr.description: The actual amount of the facility's wastewater flow measured in million gallons per day (MGD).

CWPStateWaterBodyCode.description:
Code from the Assessment TMDL Tracking & Implementation System (ATTAINS) database, assigned by the US Geological Survey, used to classify watersheds in the United States and the Caribbean. The code consists of twelve digits which correspond to six levels of classification:
- Region (first-level, 2-digit HUC)
- Subregion (second-level, 4-digit HUC)
- Accounting unit (third-level, 6-digit HUC)
- Cataloguing unit (fourth-level, 8-digit HUC)
- Watershed (fifth-level, 10-digit HUC)
- Subwatershed (sixth-level, 12-digit HUC)

CWPStateWaterBodyName.description: The name of the watershed from the ATTAINS database in which the facility resides.

AttainsCycleYear.title: ATTAINS Cycle Year
AttainsCycleYear.description: The year in which the most recent state assessment occurred for the waterbody. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

RadGnisName.title: Reach Address Database GNIS Name
RadGnisName.description: The name of the waterbody from the Geographic Names Information System (GNIS) database in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly.

RadReachcode.title: Reach Address Database Reach Code
RadReachcode.description: A nationally unique and permanent identifier for the waterbody, assigned by the US Geological Survey.

RadWBDHuc12.title: Reach Address Database Watershed Boundary Dataset HUC12 Code
RadWBDHuc12.description:
Code from the Reach Address Database (RAD), assigned by the US Geological Survey, used to classify watersheds in the United States and the Caribbean. The code consists of twelve digits which correspond to six levels of classification:
- Region (first-level, 2-digit HUC)
- Subregion (second-level, 4-digit HUC)
- Accounting unit (third-level, 6-digit HUC)
- Cataloguing unit (fourth-level, 8-digit HUC)
- Watershed (fifth-level, 10-digit HUC)
- Subwatershed (sixth-level, 12-digit HUC)

RadHu12Name.title: Reach Address Database HUC12 Name
RadHu12Name.description: The name of the waterbody in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly (from the Reach Address Database, RAD).

AttainsSource.title: ATTAINS Source
AttainsSource.description: The CWA Report in which the waterbody data can be found. The data are from the Assessment TMDL Tracking & Implementation System (ATTAINS) database.

AttainsImpWaterFlg.title: ATTAINS Impaired Water Flag
AttainsImpWaterFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is listed for impairment. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsAuCategory.title: ATTAINS Assessment Unit Category
AttainsAuCategory.description:
The impairment class or category of the waterbody in which the facility is permitted to discharge directly. The data are from the ATTAINS database:
- 5  = Impaired: TMDL needed. Available information indicates that at least one designated use is not being supported and a TMDL is needed (also known as the 303(d) listed waters).
- 4  = Impaired: TMDL not needed. Available information indicates that at least one designated use is not being supported, but a TMDL is not needed (see subcategories).
- 4a = TMDL completed. A TMDL has been completed, but impairment still exists.
- 4b = TMDL alternative. Impairment is being addressed by a method other than a TMDL (e.g., stream bank improvements).
- 4c = Non-pollutant causes. Cause of impairment is not a pollutant (e.g., habitat destruction).

AttainsAquaticLifeUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Aquatic Life Use Flag
AttainsAquaticLifeUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for aquatic life use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsExceptnlUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Exceptional Use Flag
AttainsExceptnlUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for exceptional use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsRecreationUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Recreational Use Flag
AttainsRecreationUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for recreational use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsShellfishUseFlg.title: ATTAINS Shellfish Use Flag
AttainsShellfishUseFlg.description: Displays "Y" if the waterbody in which the facility resides is designated for shellfish use. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsStateCauses.title: ATTAINS State Causes
AttainsStateCauses.description: Lists all pollutants or stressors that are causing impairment in the assessed waterbody. The data are from the ATTAINS database.

AttainsCauseGroups.title: ATTAINS Cause Groups

The format is ZZZZZNNNNNSSSSS, where ZZZZZ = ZIP code, NNNNN = the first 5 consonants of the name, and SSSSS = the first 5 non-blank non-special characters in the street address.

DmrTwpe.description: Total toxic-weighted pounds equivalent (TWPE) discharged by the NPDES ID for the most recent complete calendar year. TWPE is the mass of a pollutant or chemical discharged that accounts for its relative toxicity.

DmrImpairedPoll.example: Mercury | Oil and grease | Solids, total suspended | Temperature, water deg. centigrade | Temperature, water deg. fahrenheit | pH
DmrImpairedPoll.description: The pollutants with limits or monitoring requirements in a facility's NPDES permit with the potential to contribute to impairment of local waterbodies

AssociatedPollutant.description: Description of pollutant(s) or pollutant constituent(s) associated with each industrial activity exposed to stormwater.

ControlMeasure.description: Description of control measures employed to comply with the non-numeric technology-based effluent limits required in Part 2.1.2 and Part 8.

ControlMeasureSchedule.title: Control Measure Schedule
ControlMeasureSchedule.description: Description of schedule for control measures associated with good housekeeping and maintenance.

FacIndianCntryFlg.description: Flag showing Y/N whether the facility is located in Indian Country.
